scripts.deploy: hugo && aws s3 sync --acl public-read --sse --delete public/  s3://aws-website-httpsdashbirdio-nvzul && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E19T4M9Y3XAQXS --paths '/*'
scripts.deploy-staging: hugo -b https://staging.dashbird.io/ && aws s3 sync --acl public-read --sse --delete public/  s3://staging.dashbird.io && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E2B9Q1NEUTU80 --paths '/*'
